summary: U.S. Special Operations Forces are being refocused to do different kinds of missions than they have in the past few decades. These service members now must decide to embrace this change in focus or leave the military. We examined Defense Department programs that help with the transition to civilian life and more. Fewer than half of Special Operations service members started the mandatory transition program...
title: Transition to Civilian Life: Additional Data Analysis and Reporting Would Improve Special Operations Forces Experiences
